entry.dcterms:title: Social Aid System in Hungary 1994. Aid sample.
entry.dcterms:creator: Dávid, Kriszta
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-D86a: Social Aid System in Hungary 1994. Aid sample.. data sheet. Version: 2007-01-19
entry.dcterms:creator: Harcsa, István
entry.dcterms:description: the practice of giving of social aid by local self-governments; type, amount, entitlement of social aid
entry.dcterms:subject: social welfare policy and systems
political institutions, public administration
document
administrative records
time-series

Non-representative sample. Experimental data collection based on a computer register registration. Registration data from 44 local self-governments were used. Data about 82.000 households and 550.000 social aid were registered in the social welfare offices of the self-governments. From each county 1-1 city and village can also be found in the sample (7 county seats, 19 smaller owns, 17 villages and districts from Budapest).
Summary of administrative records.
C
